About Me

Hi, I'm Yixuan.

Born in China 🇨🇳, I've studied in the UK 🇬🇧 and Germany 🇩🇪, and now I'm based in Zurich, Switzerland 🇨🇭. I'm into all things tech—from Natural Language Processing to web development and 3D modeling. I've taught myself tools like Blender, Astro, and Three.js, and I'm always experimenting, breaking things, and figuring out how to put them back together (better).

Outside the screen, you'll probably find me traveling 🛥️, cycling 🚴🏻‍♀️, playing badminton 🏸, or out hunting Pokémons :P I love exploring—both the world around me and the things I don't know (yet).

Right now, I'm focused on becoming a better developer. I've been documenting my journey as I go, hoping that my learning process might help others starting out too.
